extendedInfo.description: Plague Inc. is a unique mix of high strategy and terrifyinglyrealistic simulation from developer Ndemic Creations and brought toyou on Android by Miniclip. Can you infect the world?Your pathogen has just infected 'Patient Zero'. Now you must bringabout the end of human history by evolving a deadly, global Plaguewhilst adapting against everything humanity can do to defend itself.Brilliantly executed with innovative gameplay and built from theground up for mobile, Plague Inc. evolves the strategy genre andpushes mobile gaming (and you) to new levels. Itâs You vs. the world -only the strongest can survive!A global hit with over 150,000 five star ratings from around theworld and features in newspapers such as The Economist, New York Post,Boston Herald, The Guardian and London Metro.â¶ âPlague Inc will snag your attention in all the right ways and keepit thereâ - Touch Arcadeâ¶ âNo denying Plague Inc.'s high-level of qualityâ - Modojoâ¶ âPlague Inc. should not be as much fun as it isâ â London Metroâ¶ âWill leave you hoping to destroy the world, all in the name of abit of funâ â Pocket Lintâ¶ âPlague Inc will bring out the evil side of any gamer with its goalof creating a super virus capable of wiping out the entire humanpopulationâ â G4tvâ¶ âPlague Inc.'s gameplay is infectiousâ - Slide to Playâ¶ âKilling billions has never been so funâ â IGN Features:âStunning graphics with a highly polished interface (Contagion guaranteed)âHighly detailed, hyper-realistic world with advanced AI (Outbreak management)âComprehensive in-game help and tutorial system (I am Legendarily helpful)â7 different disease types with radically different strategies tomaster + 5 special mutations (11 Monkeys?)âFull Save/Load functionality (28 Saves Later!)â50+ countries to infect, hundreds of traits to evolve, thousands ofworld events to adapt to (Pandemic evolved)âScoreboards and achievements to track the epidemicLocalised in English, German, French, Italian, Portuguese Brazilian and Spanish.****FAQ.Q: What do I get in the free version?A: You can play and unlock all 7 Standard Plague types. You will also unlock Genes which can be used in the full version.Q: What do I get when I upgrade to the full version?A: The full version removes ads, lets you use genetic modification with Genes, play in fast forward mode, and will also let you unlock and play Special Plague types for free by beating the whole game on Brutal!****Like Plague Inc. on Facebook:http://www.facebook.com/Ndemic.CreationsFollow Ndemic Creations and Miniclip on Twitter:http://twitter.com/NdemicCreationshttp://twitter.com/Miniclip****Please get in touch if you have any feedback for us!****P.S. Give yourself a pat on the back if you got all the themedliterature references!

reviews.title: This is good, good
reviews.comment: Awesome distraction from school work! Only needs more content/more variety.
reviews.author: Samuli Niemi

reviews.title: Love this game. It does not love my battery.
reviews.comment: Addictive and great sim.. An update to reduce battery consumption would be awesome. One 30 minute session kills about 40% of my rooted HTC one X +
reviews.author: Andrew Worrall

reviews.title: Great game
reviews.comment: Great game, easy to play, and giving me a minor God complex. No real issues, except loading once in a while. Four stars for me! :)
reviews.author: Sarah Hayward

reviews.title: Hard to put down
reviews.comment: Extremely fun, fair difficulty app. If you favor strategy games, this is a great \'on the go\' option.
reviews.author: Joanie K

reviews.comment: Awesome and addicting game. My only complaint is I paid for the full version and the game doesn\'t seem to be removing the ads even though is says its been purchased.
reviews.author: Jeremy Fildes

reviews.title: (COUGH COUGH)
reviews.comment: One of only a few strategy games to infect my constant attention. I love it. Gotta get the full version.
reviews.author: Brandon Bailey

reviews.title: Really fun
reviews.comment: Not something you can play in addition to doing something else. Really have to pay attention. Which is such rarity in mobile games.
reviews.author: Doug Lee

reviews.title: Awesome game
reviews.comment: If you ppl r jobless and lookin for games, then this is THE GAME for you folks!!! Good job developers
reviews.author: vikram s

reviews.title: Great, but.. Cell service cut?
reviews.comment: I love that game play, it is such a classic to me already. I have noticed though (this is why 4 stars) that after about 15min of playing, my phone will no longer get service. I don\'t know if this is a bug with my phone (htc one), or something that has happened to others, but maybe this could be looked into? Thanks!
reviews.author: Tynan Burch

reviews.title: Tis awesome!!!
reviews.comment: Great gameplay,  multiple outcomes,  versatile and realistic,  this game is just great   :D
reviews.author: Aryaman Reddi

reviews.title: Brilliant!
reviews.comment: Really good, smart, fun and addictive game. Highly recommended.
reviews.author: Jo\303\243o Oliveira

reviews.title: Pretty awesome
reviews.comment: I just can\'t seem to get some of the achievements no matter what I do or try. Purchase the game, and help the dev out; he\'s doing this by himself. Endless hours of replay value. Overall solid investment.
reviews.author: Jonathan Deatherage

reviews.title: A wonderful simulation that is quirky and enjoyable
reviews.comment: A game you could easily play for days
reviews.author: Damus Epicus

reviews.title: one day......watch........
reviews.comment: my old lady is a nurse and im a truck driver whos gonna spread the lates and greatest alllll around..... and now iv got the model...lol   awesome game, cant put it down
reviews.author: darek lebensztejn

reviews.title: Beautiful
reviews.comment: Works exactly as the game pandemic. One thing as others have said, battery. If you can find a way to fix the drain if possible, it\'ll be one of if not the best app on the market
reviews.author: Robert Cruz

reviews.title: Droid 4
reviews.comment: Love it,good game..Freeze\'s up now and then, other than that I\'m a happy customer...couldn\'t wait to unlock stuff ,paid a few bucks so I could check the rest out..
reviews.author: Leon Mullins

reviews.title: Very good
reviews.comment: Excellent gameplay, challenging, Very creative and instructive. Would give a5 with more content.
reviews.author: Cyrille Locatelli

reviews.title: Excellent fun and replay.
reviews.comment: Really enjoyed game on iOS and glad to see on android. Sophisticated. Lots of replay value. Bought the unlock to support devs. Totally worth it.
reviews.author: Rajeev Krishna

reviews.title: I would give 5 stars but...
reviews.comment: It freezes my phone and I have to start all over haven\'t gotten out of first round :/ Otherwise I love this game it is addictive lol you\'ve been warned lol
reviews.author: Angelia Presley

reviews.title: Fun game
reviews.comment: This is a great game.  It takes just the right amount of time to play.  There are in game purchases offered but it is perfectly playable without them.
reviews.author: Eric Shumate
